Backgrounds

To indicate status, use:

.u-bg-green (success)

.u-bg-yellow (warning)

.u-bg-red (error)

Helpers:

.u-bg-transparent

.u-bg-white

Datto's primary colors:

.u-bg-blue

.u-bg-teal

.u-bg-citrus

.u-bg-midnight

.u-bg-gray-70

.u-bg-gray-40

.u-bg-gray-30

.u-bg-gray-20

.u-bg-gray-5

.u-bg-gray-2

.u-bg-gray-1
